text: [It grumbled and continued to grow bigger. More heads and faces popped out from its sides.]
[You continue to hold your phone in your now trembling hand, still trying to take a picture.]
[It’s voice was uncanny. It boomed from wall to wall like a haunting echo.]

name: Ashton
text: Look, I didn’t mean to- I-I’ll just go-
[A tentacle like stream of ooze whips past your face, leaving some goo on your cheek.]

name: Ashton
text: What do you want, a fight? You’re a big pile of goop! I’d beat you easy!

name: Black Blob Monster
text: You face the coursing red river…to battle violence itself…
